title: Shoujo Kageki ☆ Revue Starlight - To Love Is To Suffer (Doujinshi)
description:
Tendou Maya wonders how she should go about showing her affections to and asking to spend more time with Claudine. Navigating one's first love is quite difficult.

Yuri MayaKuro (Maya x Claudine) One-Shot Doujinshi

Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki ☆ Revue Starlight
